detectors.description:
EdgeSmartToken.transferOwnership(address) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/83/838df5c03147f0b038c24b18af5bb5dee1ffd446_Edgecoin.sol#303-306) should emit an event for: 
	- EdgeSmartTokenOwner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/83/838df5c03147f0b038c24b18af5bb5dee1ffd446_Edgecoin.sol#305)

Edgecoin.initiateWithdrawal(address,uint256).destination (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/83/838df5c03147f0b038c24b18af5bb5dee1ffd446_Edgecoin.sol#455) lacks a zero-check on :
		- pendingAddress = destination (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/83/838df5c03147f0b038c24b18af5bb5dee1ffd446_Edgecoin.sol#462)

Edgecoin.createTokens(address) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/83/838df5c03147f0b038c24b18af5bb5dee1ffd446_Edgecoin.sol#511-527) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- ICOActive && (now < ICO_hardcoded_expiry_date) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/83/838df5c03147f0b038c24b18af5bb5dee1ffd446_Edgecoin.sol#513)
